vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
IStableSwap3Pool (IStableSwap3Pool.sol#6-46) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (IStableSwap3Pool.sol#12)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity >=0.6.11;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IStableSwap3Pool.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.6.11 (IStableSwap3Pool.sol#4): it allows old versions
